TABLE.NAME: tictactoe
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for tictactoe, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the instance of the assignment. Displayed at the top of each page.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: General introduction of the tictactoe activity

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the intro field (MOODLE, HTML, MARKDOWN...)

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum grade. Can be negative to indicate the use of a scale.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this assignment instance.

INDEX.NAME: course
INDEX.COMMENT: The course this assignment instance belongs to.
